title: Portfolio Website - React + Vite
description: A modern and responsive personal portfolio website built using React and Vite to showcase projects, skills, and contact information with a clean and professional UI.

title: Barber Shop Website - MERN Stack
description: A modern and responsive barber shop website designed to showcase services, pricing, and brand identity. The platform includes a clean UI, smooth navigation, service sections, and is optimized for both desktop and mobile users, providing an engaging experience for customers.

title: Hotel Management System - React.js
description: A hotel management system designed to manage room bookings, guest records, and service details with a smooth and user-friendly interface.

title: Jan Seva Kendra Portal - Next.js
description: A government service portal built using Next.js for Jan Seva Kendra to handle online applications, form submissions, and citizen service management.

title: Data Dashboard - React + Chart.js
description: An interactive data dashboard built using React and Chart.js to display analytics, reports, and insights with clear and responsive visualizations.
